alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 22 at 3:56AM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...The western Mosquito Range, east Lake County above 11000 Feet, eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Feet and eastern San Juan Mountains above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
